encouraging.romaji: SSR wa kimi no mono da!

encouraging.jp: 伝説級の神引きになるぞ！
encouraging.romaji: Densetsu-kyū no kamihiki ni naru zo!
encouraging.en: This will be a legendary god-pull!

encouraging.romaji: Omae no un wa saikyō da!
Hoshi ga kimi o michibiite iru!

encouraging.en: This is the moment of truth!
It’s time to test your luck!
I can see the light of SSR!

encouraging.romaji: Ten ni inore, chi ni negae!
encouraging.en: Pray to the heavens, wish to the earth!

encouraging.romaji: Densetsu wa kimi no yubisaki kara!
encouraging.en: Legends are born from your fingertips!

encouraging.jp: もう勝利の音が聞こえる！
encouraging.romaji: Mō shōri no oto ga kikoeru!
encouraging.en: I can already hear the sound of victory!
The goddess is smiling at you!

encouraging.romaji: Kyō no kimi wa muteki da!

encouraging.en: If you believe, the SSR will come!

mocking.jp: またRかよ、やっぱり運なし！

mocking.en: Did you expect something? Too bad!

mocking.jp: 君のガチャ運は最低だな！
mocking.romaji: Kimi no gacha-un wa saitei da na!
mocking.en: Your gacha luck is the worst!

mocking.jp: 爆死マスターの称号を授与します！
mocking.romaji: Bakushi masutā no shōgō o juyo shimasu!
mocking.en: You’ve earned the title of Master of Fail Pulls!

mocking.jp: 財布がスッカラカンになるぞ！
mocking.romaji: Saifu ga sukkarakan ni naru zo!
mocking.en: Your wallet will be empty soon!

mocking.jp: 運営に嫌われてるんじゃない？
ガチャの神に見放されたな！
mocking.romaji: Gacha no kami ni mihanasareta na!
mocking.en: You’ve been abandoned by the gacha gods!
You were dreaming too much, lol.

mocking.romaji: SSR? Ā, toshi densetsu da yo!
mocking.en: SSR? Oh, that’s just an urban legend!

mocking.jp: お祈りが足りなかったな！

mocking.en: Don’t tell me you’re gonna spend money?

mocking.jp: まだやるの？学習しないね！
mocking.romaji: Mada yaru no? Gakushū shinai ne!
Omae no SSR wa yume no naka!
mocking.en: Your SSR only exists in dreams!

mocking.jp: ガチャ神『またRで我慢しろ』

mocking.en: The more you pull, the more trash you get!
A moment of silence for your wallet!
Another day of stable trash luck!

mocking.jp: お前の運気は地底レベル！
mocking.romaji: Omae no unki wa chitei reberu!
